languages.text: "Ты сказала, что должна судить каждого на этой станции. Я тоже хочу предстать перед твоим судом".

traits.locale_text: "Ты сказала, что должна судить каждого на этой станции. Я тоже хочу предстать перед твоим судом".

languages.text: "You said you would not rest until you had judged every soul on this station. I, too, wish to stand before your court."
languages.original_text: "Ты сказала, что должна судить каждого на этой станции. Я тоже хочу предстать перед твоим судом".

traits.locale_text: "You said you would not rest until you had judged every soul on this station. I too wish to stand before your court."
"You said you would not rest until you had judged every soul on this station. I too wish to stand before your court."
"You said you would not rest until you had judged every soul on this station. I, too, wish to stand before your court."
"You said you would not rest until you had judged every soul on this station. I, too, wish to stand before your court."
"You said you would not rest until you had judged every soul on this station. I, too, wish to stand before your court."
"You said you would not rest until you had judged every soul on this station. I, too, wish to stand before your court."

languages.text: “你说过，只有将这座星站上的每个人都审判一遍之后，你才会休息。既然如此，我也希望能接受你的审判。”
languages.original_text: "You said you would not rest until you had judged every soul on this station. I, too, wish to stand before your court."

traits.locale_text: “你说过，只有将这座星站上的每个人都审判一遍之后，你才会休息。既然如此，我也希望能接受你的审判。”

languages.text: 「このステーションの全員を裁くまで休まないと言ってたではないか。{mf|俺|私}も、法定に立たせてもらおう」
languages.original_text: "You said you would not rest until you had judged every soul on this station. I, too, wish to stand before your court."

traits.locale_text: 「このステーションの全員を裁くまで休まないと言ってたではないか。{mf|俺|私}も、法定に立たせてもらおう」

languages.text: «Dijo que no descansaría hasta haber juzgado a todos en esta estación. Yo también quiero presentarme ante su tribunal».
languages.original_text: "You said you would not rest until you had judged every soul on this station. I, too, wish to stand before your court."

traits.locale_text: «Dijo que no descansaría hasta haber juzgado a todos en esta estación. Yo también quiero presentarme ante su tribunal».

languages.text: "Ihr habt gesagt, Ihr würdet nicht ruhen, bis Ihr über jede einzelne Seele auf dieser Station geurteilt habt. Auch ich möchte vor Eurem Gericht stehen."
languages.original_text: "You said you would not rest until you had judged every soul on this station. I, too, wish to stand before your court."

traits.locale_text: "Ihr habt gesagt, Ihr würdet nicht ruhen, bis Ihr über jede einzelne Seele auf dieser Station geurteilt habt. Auch ich möchte vor Eurem Gericht stehen."

languages.text: « Vous avez dit que vous n'aurez de cesse que toutes les âmes de cette station soient jugées. Moi aussi, je souhaite me soumettre à votre jugement. »
languages.original_text: "You said you would not rest until you had judged every soul on this station. I, too, wish to stand before your court."

traits.locale_text: « Vous avez dit que vous n'aurez de cesse que toutes les âmes de cette station soient jugées. Moi aussi, je souhaite me soumettre à votre jugement. »

languages.text: "Bu istasyondaki her bir ruh hakkında hüküm verene kadar durmayacağını söyledin. Ben de yargılanmak istiyorum."
languages.original_text: "You said you would not rest until you had judged every soul on this station. I, too, wish to stand before your court."

traits.locale_text: "Bu istasyondaki her bir ruh hakkında hüküm verene kadar durmayacağını söyledin. Ben de yargılanmak istiyorum."
